entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
